<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->
## `ci-macos.yml`
<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->
Build and run tests on macOS.

<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->
## `ci-pages.yml`
<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->
Build publish documentation to GitHub pages.

<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->
## `analysis-codeql.yml`
<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->
Build and analyze with CodeCL.

<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->
## `analysis-sonar.yml`
<!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->
Build, run tests, collect coverage, analyze with SonarCloud and upload the 
coverage data to Codecov.
